title: Budget 2024 may see Modi government continue its pitch for India's green energy ambitions
description: BUDGET EXPECTATIONS: Industry experts anticipate the Union Budget 2024 will maintain the Modi government’s focus on renewable energy, emphasizing policy stability and increased investment. Sharad Mahendra of JSW Energy underscores the need for consistent policies to support long-term projects and a significant boost in annual renewable capacity to meet India’s 2030 target of 500 GW.
